definition.text: Letâ€™s build the mother of all trading strategies: The Moving Average Cross!

paragraphs.text: For this tutorial I assume that
You have done the Welcome Tutorial in the Getting Started Workspace
You are comfortable moving around the Workspace and the Charts
You have a basic understanding about what is a Trading Bot and a strategy
We will build a bot to backtest a strategy based on Simple Moving Average Cross between SMA50 and SMA200 on 4H TF. A classic!
